text:
Champions League
OL-Benfica streaming: where to see the match?
Olympique Lyonnais receive Benfica Lisbon on behalf of the fourth day of the Champions League. A meeting broadcast live on French television on the RMC Sport 1 channel, this Tuesday, November 5, 2019 from 21 hours, but also to follow live streaming on Android, iPhone, iPad, PC or Mac.
05 Nov 2019, 06:15 by Florian Sermaise



OL rejoins Groupama Stadium on the European stage. After two trips to various fortunes, the Gones have actually rendezvous on their lawn with Benfica Lisbon, their executioner of the previous episode, on behalf of the fourth day of Group G Champions League. After a draw against Zenith Saint-Petersburg (1-1), then a victory on the field of RB Leipzig (2-0), the OL has indeed fallen for the first time from its European campaign there is two weeks, in Portugal (1-2). A defeat which, moreover, totally revived the suspense in the group G. At the time of attacking the return phase, Rudi Garcia and his men point in the third place of the hen with 4 points, tied with the Zenith and with only one unit ahead of his evening opponent. A success at Groupama Stadium could almost exclude the Lusitanian club.








Group G calendar




Alex Grimaldo Erases Maxwell Cornet + 15 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - September 17th

18h55: Lyon 1-1 Zenith
9 pm: Benfica 1-2 RB Leipzig

2nd day - October 2nd

9 pm: RB Leipzig 0-2 Lyon
9 pm: Zenith 3-1 Benfica

3rd day - 23rd of October

18h55: RB Leipzig 2-1 Zenith
21 hours: Benfica 2-1 Lyon

4th day - November 5th

18h55: Zenith - RB Leipzig
9 pm: Lyon - Benfica

5th day - 27th November

18h55: Zenith - Lyon
9 pm: RB Leipzig - Benfica

6th day - December 10th

9 pm: Benfica - Zenith
9 pm: Lyon - RB Leipzig

The classification of group G




Houssem Aouar wrestling with Gedson Fernandes + 15 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1- RB Leipzig (6 points, 0)
2- Zenith St. Petersburg (4 points, 1)
3- Lyon (4 points, 1)
4- Benfica (3 points, -2)

The first two of the group are qualified in the round of 16. The third is donated to the Europa League. The last definitely leaves the European Cup for this season.
OL-Benfica streaming




Memphis Depay ready to challenge the Portuguese defense + 15 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This meeting of the 4th day of Champions League between Olympique Lyonnais and Benfica Lisbon is broadcast this Tuesday, November 5, 2019 on RMC Sport 1 from 21 hours, French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. As a result, you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option



Photo Albums
